name: Skeletal Tyrannosaurus Rex
movement: 50 feet walking speed, able to close distance quickly
description: A gigantic skeletal dinosaur, imposing and horrifying, with a ferocious bite and tail.
memorable: Immune to poison, fearsome physical power, and grappling capacity.
goals: To dominate the battlefield and instill fear in its enemies.
relations: Might be encountered alongside other undead creatures; could be a servant of a necromancer.
environment: Often found in graveyards, ancient battlefields, or places of dark magic.
strengths: High hit points and physical damage output, can grapple for advantage on follow-up attacks.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to bludgeoning damage, which can be exploited effectively.
attacks: Multiattack option includes a powerful bite that can grapple and a strong tail strike.
most_powerful_ability: Multiattack allows it to attack twice in one turn, increasing damage output significantly.
senses: Has darkvision up to 60 feet, enhancing its ability to navigate in low light.
additional_information: Undead Nature prevents needing air, food, or sleep.
Low Dexterity makes it less agile in combat.
High Constitution ensures it can withstand significant damage.
Grappling allows for increased effectiveness against single targets.
Bone structure gives it immunity to poison damage.
test_queries: powerful skeletal creature with piercing bite
massive dinosaur-like skeleton immune to poison
terrifying undead with strength in battle
monster that avoids air and sustenance
